name: Tap to Shoot
description:
Tap to Shoot is a fast-paced puzzler that will leave you screaming in frustration, but you’ll keep coming back for more.

Test your reflexes against time and moving objects, but don't miss your target or it's Game Over!

Enjoy this simple and fun game!

Game Features:
• Rhythm-based Action!
• Smooth mechanic
• Loads of challenging levels
• Shoot bullets at small targets
• Game Center to track your scores
• Challenge yourself with the near impossible!

***DOWNLOAD NOW & TEST YOUR REFLEXES***

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/GoldCoinKingdom  
Support: support@goldcoinkingdom.com
